title: Euro round-up: Barca fight back to beat Galatasaray
shortDescription: Barcelona fought back to win 2-1 at Galatasaray on Thursday and advance to the Europa League quarter-finals 2-1 on aggregate after a scoreless draw in the first leg.

title: Yarmolenko the hero again as West Ham reach EL quarter-finals
shortDescription: Andriy Yarmolenko was again the hero for West Ham as his extra-time goal knocked out Sevilla and sent the Hammers into the Europa League quarter-finals.

title: Papers: Barcelona rekindle interest in Rashford
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Friday's national newspapers...

title: Man arrested after tying himself to post during Everton-Newcastle
shortDescription: A man was arrested on Thursday evening after Everton's Premier League game against Newcastle was delayed for seven minutes when a protester tied himself to a goal post.

title: Lampard: I broke hand in celebrations | Howe: Second half cost us
shortDescription: Everton manager Frank Lampard broke his hand celebrating a late 1-0 win over Newcastle which ignited their fight to avoid relegation.

title: Iwobi strikes last-gasp winner as 10-man Everton beat Newcastle
shortDescription: Alex Iwobi struck in the ninth minute of stoppage time as 10-man Everton ended a four-game losing streak with a dramatic 1-0 victory over Newcastle.

title: Goldson suffers racist abuse after Rangers progress
shortDescription: Rangers defender Connor Goldson suffered racist abuse on Instagram after the club defeated Red Star Belgrade to reach the Europa League quarter-finals.

title: Premier League relegation picture: Who is going down?
shortDescription: The battle for Premier League survival continues - but which of the contenders are best placed to avoid the drop?

title: Iwobi stuns Newcastle with late Everton winner
shortDescription: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Everton's win against Newcastle in the Premier League.

title: European hits & misses: Motivational Moyes has Hammers believing
shortDescription:
Andriy Yarmolenko climbed off the bench to sink Sevilla as West Ham prolonged
their European adventure with a dramatic extra-time win.

title: Fofana helps battling Leicester into ECL quarters
shortDescription: Wesley Fofana scored on his return from a broken leg as Leicester hung on to a 3-2 agg win in Rennes to reach the Europa Conference League quarter-finals.

title: Marsch: I feel like I belong at Leeds
shortDescription: Jesse Marsch tells Sky Sports why he already feels at home at Leeds and how mentor Ralf Rangnick gave him an 'explosion' of ideas about management.

title: England squad talking points: Sancho unlucky, worrying for Rashford
shortDescription: After Gareth Southgate named his first England squad of 2022 for this month's internationals, Sky Sports' football journalists analyse the key talking points.

title: Chelsea sale: State of play ahead of Friday bid deadline
shortDescription: With the deadline for any Chelsea bids required by Friday evening, we take a look at the latest state of play and possible consortiums who could submit their offers.

title: Inside the WSL: Eidevall Q&A
shortDescription: Get to know Arsenal Women's head coach Jonas Eidevall as he answers a whole range of questions for Inside the WSL including what toppings he likes on his favourite pizza.

title: Wolves vs Leeds on Sky: Phillips and Cooper in contention
shortDescription: Team news, stats, predictions and how to follow the Premier League on Friday as Wolves host Leeds, live on Sky Sports.

title: All Thursday's scores and results
shortDescription: Keep up to date with all the games across the country and the continent...

title: Sala overcome by toxic fumes before dying in plane crash
shortDescription: Emiliano Sala died as a result of a plane crash, having been overcome by toxic levels of carbon monoxide during an unlicensed flight, an inquest jury concluded.

title: No Rashford, Sancho in England squad | Guehi earns first call-up
shortDescription: Marcus Rashford and Jadon Sancho have been left out of the England squad, while Crystal Palace centre-back Marc Guehi has earned his first call-up.

title: Prutton's Championship predictions
shortDescription: Who is David Prutton tipping for victory in the Sky Bet Championship this weekend? Find out here...
